author: Shimesaba

text:
Sakuraba's music works very well during the game, but none of his compositions reach the desired level of emotion. He always misses basic chords like sub-dominant, dominant, dominant's dominant or tonic major.

His best OST is Valkyrie Profile 2 and his best song is the battle theme from Eternal Sonata.
